name: dangerdodger
description:
use wasd or arrow keys to move

look around with your mouse

press space to fire

try and hit the red balls with your bullets and avoid being hit by their bullets

this is my first full game which I haven't followed a tutorial for. Pls enjoy

also if you cannot download you can play it here though it works much better downloaded https://play.unity.com/mg/other/the-build
